<entry name="GrowthHint" value="Growth
Indicates how fast the city grows. Once enough growth has been accumulated, the population increases by one. The growth rate decreases with the population approaching the population limit."/> <entry name="GrowthIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="GrowthFactorIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="HeroDamageReductionIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="HealingRateIcon" value=""/>

<entry name="ItemSlotsHint" value="Item Slots
"/> <entry name="ItemSlotsIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="LevelDescription" value="The experience level of the unit.
Every level above the first increases the unit's hitpoints and damage by 5% as well as morale by 10%."/> <entry name="LevelIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="LevelMaxIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="LifeStealIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="LifeStealFactorIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="LoyaltyHint" value="Loyalty
Indicates the population's dedication to your cause. Each positive point of loyalty increases the city's total resource output by 1% while each negative point decreases it by 2% (down to -50%). Each city after the first decreases loyalty in all cities by 6."/> <entry name="LoyaltyIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="LoyaltyPerCityIcon" value=""/>

<entry name="MeleeArmorPenetrationIcon" value=""/>

<entry name="MeleeDamageTakenIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="MinDamageFromHitpointsFractionIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="MoraleIcon" value=""/> <entry name="MoraleDescription" value="The psychological state of the unit.
Below 66% morale units become shaken, decreasing accuracy and increasing damage taken by 17%.
Below 33% morale units become broken, decreasing accuracy and increasing damage taken by 33%."/>
<entry name="MoraleRegenerationIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="MoraleLossFactorIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="MoraleMaxIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="MovementIcon" value=""/> <entry name="MovementDescription" value="The number of tiles a unit can move through in one turn.
Rough terrain requires more than a single movement point.
Moving into a tile adjacent to an enemy ends movement."/>
<entry name="MovementCostIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="MovementMaxIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="OreIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="OreCostIcon" value=""/> <entry name="OreCostHint" value="Ore Cost
"/>
<entry name="OrePerKillValueIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="PopulationIcon" value=""/> <entry name="PopulationHint" value="Population
Used to operate buildings in the city. Each enabled building requires one population to operate. If the required population exceeds the current population, the resource output of buildings is reduced."/>
<entry name="PopulationLimitIcon" value=""/> <entry name="PopulationLimitHint" value="Population Limit
Indicates the maximum population the city can hold."/>
<entry name="ProductionIcon" value=""/> <entry name="ProductionHint" value="Production
Indicates how fast the building produces."/>
<entry name="ProductionCostIcon" value=""/>

Used to discover new technologies."/> <entry name="ResearchIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="ResearchPerExperienceIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="SightIcon" value=""/> <entry name="SightDescription" value="How far the unit can see.
Line of sight is reduced by terrain features such as forests, smoke and cliffs."/>
<entry name="TargetArmorIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="TurnsIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="WitchfireDamageReductionIcon" value=""/>
<entry name="BiomassHint" value="Biomass
Used to sustain the population in cities, construct buildings as well as produce and maintain units."/> <entry name="EnergyHint" value="Energy
Used to maintain buildings as well as produce and maintain special units."/> <entry name="FoodHint" value="Food
Used to sustain the population in cities as well as produce and maintain biological units."/> <entry name="OreHint" value="Ore
Used to construct buildings as well as produce and maintain mechanical units."/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/InfluenceHint" value="Influence
Used to acquire and maintain city tiles, invoke edicts as well as recruit powerful hero units and purchase their items."/> <entry name="Necrons/EnergyHint" value="Energy
Used to construct buildings and produce units."/> <entry name="Necrons/InfluenceHint" value="Influence
Used to acquire and maintain city tiles, invoke special abilities as well as recruit powerful hero units and purchase their items."/> <entry name="Necrons/OreHint" value="Ore
Used to sustain the population in cities as well as maintain buildings and units."/> <entry name="Orks/InfluenceHint" value="Influence
Used to acquire and maintain city tiles, maintain the Waaagh! as well as recruit powerful hero units and purchase their items."/> <entry name="SpaceMarines/InfluenceHint" value="Influence
Used to acquire and maintain city tiles, invoke tactics and operations as well as recruit powerful hero units and purchase their items."/> <entry name="SpaceMarines/RequisitionsHint" value="Requisitions
Used to sustain the population in the city, construct buildings as well as produce and maintain units."/> <entry name="Tyranids/InfluenceHint" value="Influence
Used to acquire and maintain city tiles, maintain buildings, invoke special abilities as well as recruit powerful hero units and purchase their items."/>
